verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.web: LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD spoke to Moses and said,

verses.kjv: Again, thou shalt say to the children of Israel, Whosoever he be of the children of Israel, or of the strangers that sojourn in Israel, that giveth any of his seed unto Molech; he shall surely be put to death: the people of the land shall stone him with stones.
verses.web: “Moreover, you shall tell the children of Israel, ‘Anyone of the children of Israel, or of the strangers who live as foreigners in Israel, who gives any of his offspring to Molech shall surely be put to death. The people of the land shall stone that person with stones.
verses.ct: "Tell the people of Israel: Anyone among the Israelites — or any foreigner living in Israel — who sacrifices any of his children to Molech must be put to death. The people of the community must stone that person.

verses.kjv: And I will set my face against that man, and will cut him off from among his people; because he hath given of his seed unto Molech, to defile my sanctuary, and to profane my holy name.
verses.web: I also will set my face against that person, and will cut him off from among his people, because he has given of his offspring to Molech, to defile my sanctuary, and to profane my holy name.
verses.ct: I myself will turn against that person and cut him off from his people, because by sacrificing his child to Molech, he has defiled my sanctuary and dishonored my holy name.

verses.kjv: And if the people of the land do any ways hide their eyes from the man, when he giveth of his seed unto Molech, and kill him not:
verses.web: If the people of the land all hide their eyes from that person when he gives of his offspring to Molech, and don’t put him to death,
verses.ct: If the people of the community look the other way when someone sacrifices his child to Molech and don't put him to death,

verses.kjv: Then I will set my face against that man, and against his family, and will cut him off, and all that go a whoring after him, to commit whoredom with Molech, from among their people.
verses.web: then I will set my face against that man and against his family, and will cut him off, and all who play the prostitute after him to play the prostitute with Molech, from among their people.
verses.ct: then I will turn against that person and his entire family. I will cut off from their people everyone who followed him in being unfaithful to me by worshiping Molech.

verses.kjv: And the soul that turneth after such as have familiar spirits, and after wizards, to go a whoring after them, I will even set my face against that soul, and will cut him off from among his people.
verses.web: “ ‘The person that turns to those who are mediums and wizards, to play the prostitute after them, I will even set my face against that person, and will cut him off from among his people.
verses.ct: "If anyone turns to mediums or wizards, being unfaithful to me by seeking them out, I will turn against that person and cut him off from his people.

verses.kjv: Sanctify yourselves therefore, and be ye holy: for I am the LORD your God.
verses.web: “ ‘Sanctify yourselves therefore, and be holy; for I am LORD your God.
verses.ct: "So set yourselves apart and be holy, because I am the LORD your God.

verses.kjv: And ye shall keep my statutes, and do them: I am the LORD which sanctify you.
verses.web: You shall keep my statutes, and do them. I am LORD who sanctifies you.
verses.ct: Obey my laws and follow them. I am the LORD who makes you holy.

verses.kjv: For every one that curseth his father or his mother shall be surely put to death: he hath cursed his father or his mother; his blood shall be upon him.
verses.web: “ ‘For everyone who curses his father or his mother shall surely be put to death. He has cursed his father or his mother. His blood shall be upon himself.
verses.ct: "Anyone who curses his father or mother must be put to death. He cursed his own parents — he is responsible for his own death.

verses.kjv: And the man that committeth adultery with another man’s wife, even he that committeth adultery with his neighbour’s wife, the adulterer and the adulteress shall surely be put to death.
verses.web: “ ‘The man who commits adultery with another man’s wife, even he who commits adultery with his neighbor’s wife, the adulterer and the adulteress shall surely be put to death.
verses.ct: "If a man commits adultery with another man's wife — with his neighbor's wife — both the man and the woman must be put to death.

verses.kjv: And the man that lieth with his father’s wife hath uncovered his father’s nakedness: both of them shall surely be put to death; their blood shall be upon them.
verses.web: “ ‘The man who lies with his father’s wife has uncovered his father’s nakedness. Both of them shall surely be put to death. Their blood shall be upon themselves.
verses.ct: "If a man sleeps with his father's wife, he has dishonored his father. Both of them must be put to death. They are responsible for their own deaths.

verses.kjv: And if a man lie with his daughter in law, both of them shall surely be put to death: they have wrought confusion; their blood shall be upon them.
verses.web: “ ‘If a man lies with his daughter-in-law, both of them shall surely be put to death. They have committed a perversion. Their blood shall be upon themselves.
verses.ct: "If a man sleeps with his daughter-in-law, both of them must be put to death. What they have done is a perversion. They are responsible for their own deaths.

verses.kjv: If a man also lie with mankind, as he lieth with a woman, both of them have committed an abomination: they shall surely be put to death; their blood shall be upon them.
verses.web: “ ‘If a man lies with a male, as with a woman, both of them have committed an abomination. They shall surely be put to death. Their blood shall be upon themselves.
verses.ct: "If a man sleeps with another man as one sleeps with a woman, both of them have committed an abomination. They must be put to death. They are responsible for their own deaths.

verses.kjv: And if a man take a wife and her mother, it is wickedness: they shall be burnt with fire, both he and they; that there be no wickedness among you.
verses.web: “ ‘If a man takes a wife and her mother, it is wickedness. They shall be burned with fire, both he and they, that there may be no wickedness among you.
verses.ct: "If a man marries both a woman and her mother, it is wickedness. All 3 of them must be burned with fire, so that such wickedness does not exist among you.

verses.kjv: And if a man lie with a beast, he shall surely be put to death: and ye shall slay the beast.
verses.web: “ ‘If a man lies with an animal, he shall surely be put to death; and you shall kill the animal.
verses.ct: "If a man has sexual relations with an animal, he must be put to death, and you must kill the animal as well.

verses.kjv: And if a woman approach unto any beast, and lie down thereto, thou shalt kill the woman, and the beast: they shall surely be put to death; their blood shall be upon them.
verses.web: “ ‘If a woman approaches any animal and lies with it, you shall kill the woman and the animal. They shall surely be put to death. Their blood shall be upon them.
verses.ct: "If a woman approaches any animal and has sexual relations with it, you must kill both the woman and the animal. They must be put to death. They are responsible for their own deaths.

verses.kjv: And if a man shall take his sister, his father’s daughter, or his mother’s daughter, and see her nakedness, and she see his nakedness; it is a wicked thing; and they shall be cut off in the sight of their people: he hath uncovered his sister’s nakedness; he shall bear his iniquity.
verses.web: “ ‘If a man takes his sister—his father’s daughter, or his mother’s daughter—and sees her nakedness, and she sees his nakedness, it is a shameful thing. They shall be cut off in the sight of the children of their people. He has uncovered his sister’s nakedness. He shall bear his iniquity.
verses.ct: "If a man takes his sister — whether his father's daughter or his mother's daughter — and they see each other's nakedness, it is a disgraceful thing. They must be cut off publicly before their people. He has exposed his own sister's nakedness, and he will bear the punishment for his sin.

verses.kjv: And if a man shall lie with a woman having her sickness, and shall uncover her nakedness; he hath discovered her fountain, and she hath uncovered the fountain of her blood: and both of them shall be cut off from among their people.
verses.web: “ ‘If a man lies with a woman having her monthly period, and uncovers her nakedness, he has made her fountain naked, and she has uncovered the fountain of her blood. Both of them shall be cut off from among their people.
verses.ct: "If a man sleeps with a woman during her monthly period and exposes her nakedness, he has laid bare her flow of blood, and she has uncovered it as well. Both of them must be cut off from their people.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy mother’s sister, nor of thy father’s sister: for he uncovereth his near kin: they shall bear their iniquity.
verses.web: “ ‘You shall not uncover the nakedness of your mother’s sister, nor of your father’s sister, for he has made his close relative naked. They shall bear their iniquity.
verses.ct: "You must not have sexual relations with your mother's sister or your father's sister, because that dishonors a close relative. Both will bear the punishment for their sin.

verses.kjv: And if a man shall lie with his uncle’s wife, he hath uncovered his uncle’s nakedness: they shall bear their sin; they shall die childless.
verses.web: If a man lies with his uncle’s wife, he has uncovered his uncle’s nakedness. They shall bear their sin. They shall die childless.
verses.ct: "If a man sleeps with his uncle's wife, he has dishonored his uncle. They will bear the consequences of their sin and will die childless.

verses.kjv: And if a man shall take his brother’s wife, it is an unclean thing: he hath uncovered his brother’s nakedness; they shall be childless.
verses.web: “ ‘If a man takes his brother’s wife, it is an impurity. He has uncovered his brother’s nakedness. They shall be childless.
verses.ct: "If a man marries his brother's wife, it is an act of impurity. He has dishonored his brother. They will be childless.

verses.kjv: Ye shall therefore keep all my statutes, and all my judgments, and do them: that the land, whither I bring you to dwell therein, spue you not out.
verses.web: “ ‘You shall therefore keep all my statutes and all my ordinances, and do them, that the land where I am bringing you to dwell may not vomit you out.
verses.ct: "So obey all my laws and all my rules, and follow them. Otherwise the land I am bringing you into to live in will vomit you out.

verses.kjv: And ye shall not walk in the manners of the nation, which I cast out before you: for they committed all these things, and therefore I abhorred them.
verses.web: You shall not walk in the customs of the nation which I am casting out before you; for they did all these things, and therefore I abhorred them.
verses.ct: Don't adopt the practices of the nations I am driving out ahead of you. They did all these things, and I was disgusted by them.

verses.kjv: But I have said unto you, Ye shall inherit their land, and I will give it unto you to possess it, a land that floweth with milk and honey: I am the LORD your God, which have separated you from other people.
verses.web: But I have said to you, “You shall inherit their land, and I will give it to you to possess it, a land flowing with milk and honey.” I am LORD your God, who has separated you from the peoples.
verses.ct: But I have promised you: you will take possession of their land. I will give it to you as your own — a land flowing with milk and honey. I am the LORD your God, who has set you apart from all other peoples.

verses.kjv: Ye shall therefore put difference between clean beasts and unclean, and between unclean fowls and clean: and ye shall not make your souls abominable by beast, or by fowl, or by any manner of living thing that creepeth on the ground, which I have separated from you as unclean.
verses.web: “ ‘You shall therefore make a distinction between the clean animal and the unclean, and between the unclean fowl and the clean. You shall not make yourselves abominable by animal, or by bird, or by anything with which the ground teems, which I have separated from you as unclean for you.
verses.ct: "So you must distinguish between clean and unclean animals, and between clean and unclean birds. Don't make yourselves detestable by eating any animal, bird, or creature that moves along the ground — anything I have declared unclean for you.

verses.kjv: And ye shall be holy unto me: for I the LORD am holy, and have severed you from other people, that ye should be mine.
verses.web: You shall be holy to me, for I, LORD, am holy, and have set you apart from the peoples, that you should be mine.
verses.ct: You must be holy to me, because I, the LORD, am holy. I have set you apart from all other peoples to be mine.

verses.kjv: A man also or woman that hath a familiar spirit, or that is a wizard, shall surely be put to death: they shall stone them with stones: their blood shall be upon them.
verses.web: “ ‘A man or a woman that is a medium or is a wizard shall surely be put to death. They shall be stoned with stones. Their blood shall be upon themselves.’ ”
verses.ct: "Any man or woman who is a medium or a wizard must be put to death. They must be stoned. They are responsible for their own deaths."
